system.specialRules:
Traits: Amphibious, Improved Command and Control, Open-Topped, Tracked Vehicle

Special Rules: Incorporates a Multi-Spectral Auspex accessible to the driver. Can Scan for Emissions, Motion, and Biological Life signs. Has 500m Range and can see through non-shielded walls up 1m thick. Character that uses it gains +30 to Awareness and can make +10 Tech-Use Test to detect that humans normally can't such as invisible gases, life signs, non-visible radiation, etc.
